name: Onimaru Kunitsuna [Defiant]
ability: Sharply increases DMG dealt when one of the Five Swords Under Heaven is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of one of the Five Great Blades. In the past she made a major series of blunders in the line of duty, later realizing they were due to her own folly and weak spirit. Aiming for self-improvement, she learned of the beach contest. She decided that appearing in front of others in a bathing suit would be a good way to strengthen her resolve, only learning about the granted wish after already deciding to participate. At that point she just considered it a stroke of good luck, or icing on the cake, if you will.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 28/06/17 to 05/07/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 200 Mochi 28/06/17 - 05/07/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 05/07/17
◦ Can only be exchanged once

skill: "Not even a tsunami would spook me!"
